comments.comment:
if you have realized Buddhism honestly you immediately give up extreme ideas that you have in your religion. Lord Gautama Buddha has shown the truth in this world and helped people attain Nibbana by practicing the Dhamma. Those who practice dhamma know how pure and precious the Dhamma is, he is the greatest person in the whole universe. No god is above him in terms of purity that Buddha has achieved. He has no defilements in his mind. He is suitable to get worshiped by all means. 



People can sometimes praise lord buddha to get advantages. Sometimes, we have seen very cunning people trying to do various things to get close to Buddhists. We, in fact, do not know your real intention. what matters is actions, not the talks. If your intention is pure, you'll reap good things. You're responsible for your own actions.
comments.author: Truth Search
